text: Tonight let's watch Christmas classic - Home alone. Unfortunately, it's not on Netflix or HBO :(
Today we're going to see all-time-favourite Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone. You can find it on HBO
Let's go and visit Christmas fair (new one!) and eat something
It's time to buy a Christmas tree!! Don't forget - it should rest for a bit in the apartment before decorating
The day of Christmas tunes! Play Christmas playlist at dinner today
Look at this lovely opportunity to have a candle lit dinner! Let's do it today <3
Game night! What will it be - PC, Nintendo or board games? Only you know
Today's task requires a bit of preparation, so please, visit a shop before starting ;) You'll make DIY garland for the living room. How lovely!
Oh, it's so cold today! Maybe some warm hugs and hot wine will help us?
Let's make our own pizza today! Store-bought pizza works too :D
It's time to bake something! Some ideas: Czech traditional cookies, chocolate Babka from cookbook or gingerbread cookies
Fun is great, but let's take some stress of our shoulders and plan out Christmas dinner today. Btw, will someone come over
Weekend activity ahead! What about winter hike today? Stromovka, Botanical gardens or something else?
Do you remember that we have Lego set hidden away? The time has come.
Kiss! Kiss! Kiss! I know I'm supposed to be soulless text, but it's actually me, Nastia. And I love you more than anything, bulochka. Thank you for making my days meaningful <3
Remember we bought some embroideries at Tiger when went to Berlin? It's time to make them
Have you decorated your tree yet? Relax, I just want to take some pictures, that's it
Ooh! New movie to watch! Today it's The shop around the corner
How about some Christmas anime? Today we'll watch Tokio Godfathers. Pretty sure I've seen them on Netflix
Ah, old Christmas classic. In home cinema today - MIRACLE ON 34TH STREET
How about some tasty spicy chicken and round chips with cheese souse? Place an order in KFC as soon as possible!
Trashy Christmas horror movie with low rating but a lot of mentions in different lists? I mean, why not. Today we'll watch BLACK CHRISTMAS
Kiss Kiss Bang Bang. It's not what you think! It's a movie. And we're watching it today.
Classic Christmas romantic comedy. What can be better than slightly cringy jokes from 2000's? Right, nothing. Movie pick for today - The Holiday
Hmm.. I can sense that you want to try something new. How about new food for the beginning? Delivery or a recipe - doesn't matter
Hmm.. I can sense that you want to try something new. How about new food for the beginning? Delivery or a recipe - doesn't matter
Let's have a cozy board game night today. Christmas music on a background is a must!
Hey, let's play some games tonight. How about some PC cooperative games while snuggling on the couch? Sounds perfect
Christmas shopping day! Perfect for buying some gifts or decorations. Not online, though. I's officially offline christmas shopping day
Oh, it's a perfect day today to go ice-skating! You can bring friends or just go together. List with all open ice rinks you can find in Instagram (Nastia knows where)
On today's menu some hot beverages! Let's try something new, that will warm us from inside out
Have you bought a tree yet? Did it rest for a day already? ;) Now it's time to decorate!
